Topic.Title: How to stop showing player as object

Posts.EditableText:
Hello:
The player keeps showing up as though it were an object in the "You see..." sentence that comes with the room information.
It shows up as "You see a [player name], etc..." how do I fix it?

Thanks.
Posts.HTML:
Hello:
The player keeps showing up as though it were an object in the "You see..." sentence that comes with the room information.
It shows up as "You see a [player name], etc..." how do I fix it?

Thanks.

Posts.EditableText: You're probably not assigning the 'Player' attribute to the player object itself. You can do so under 'game' and the Player tab.
Posts.HTML: You're probably not assigning the 'Player' attribute to the player object itself. You can do so under 'game' and the Player tab.
